name: Faulgine
description:
(Web version does not work, sadly)

You need to get to the other station, but your engines are out of control!

AD/LeftStick - Rotation

Space/Right Trigger/R2 - Shooting

This is submission made for GMTK Game Jam 2020, game was fully made within 48h using Unity, included packages and DOTween (Tweening library)
